602: ## Section 4: Exponential Convergence
603: 
604: :::{prf:theorem} Exponential KL Convergence
605: :label: thm-exp-convergence-standalone
606: 
607: For the iterated dynamics $\mu_{t+1} = \Psi_{\text{total}}(\mu_t)$:
608: 
609: $$
610: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) \leq e^{-\lambda t} D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_0 \| \pi) + C_\infty
611: $$
612: 
613: where:
614: $$
615: \lambda = \tau(\alpha_{\text{kin}} + \beta_{\text{clone}})
616: $$
617: 
618: and:
619: $$
620: C_\infty = \frac{C_{\text{total}}}{\alpha_{\text{kin}} + \beta_{\text{clone}}}
621: $$

hints.label: unlabeled-proof-22
hints.content:
625: :::{prf:proof}
626: 
627: **Step 1**: Iterate the contraction from Theorem {prf:ref}`thm-composition-standalone`:
628: 
629: Let $\epsilon := \tau(\alpha_{\text{kin}} + \beta_{\text{clone}})$. Then:
630: 
631: $$
632: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_{t+1} \| \pi) \leq (1 - \epsilon) D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) + C_{\text{total}}
633: $$
634: 
635: **Step 2**: Unroll the recursion:
636: 
637: $$
638: \begin{aligned}
639: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) &\leq (1 - \epsilon)^t D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_0 \| \pi) + C_{\text{total}} \sum_{k=0}^{t-1} (1 - \epsilon)^k \\
640: &= (1 - \epsilon)^t D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_0 \| \pi) + C_{\text{total}} \frac{1 - (1 - \epsilon)^t}{\epsilon}
641: \end{aligned}
642: $$
643: 
644: **Step 3**: Take the limit $t \to \infty$:
645: 
646: $$
647: \lim_{t \to \infty} D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) \leq \frac{C_{\text{total}}}{\epsilon} = C_\infty
648: $$
649: 
650: **Step 4**: Approximate $(1 - \epsilon)^t$:
651: 
652: For small $\epsilon = \tau(\alpha_{\text{kin}} + \beta_{\text{clone}})$:
653: 
654: $$
655: (1 - \epsilon)^t = e^{t \log(1 - \epsilon)} \approx e^{-\epsilon t} = e^{-\lambda t}
656: $$
657: 
658: where $\lambda = \epsilon$.
659: 
660: **Step 5**: Final bound:
661: 
662: $$
663: D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_t \| \pi) \leq e^{-\lambda t} D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_0 \| \pi) + C_\infty \left(1 - e^{-\lambda t}\right) \leq e^{-\lambda t} D_{\text{KL}}(\mu_0 \| \pi) + C_\infty
664: $$
665:
